name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:46765/?a=hkaMiARI5O7c30xxtw9_d_KrlPBKLcEL_R_0z_m5eMYBEv330K0vJNo46lARK3IgmJbh0-Le8rUOFhGQsV5QRIUZHHVlnHN- HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:33599/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
